name: Barbarians!
description:
A little web-browser turn-based strategy game. You command an army of Roman soldiers and your duty is to defeat the barbarian hordes that are attacking towns outside of Rome.

* Towns that generate new units to add to your army each turn.

* Invest your gold to improve your soldiers and towns! Their armor will reflect their strength level.

* Enjoy the automatic narration of the battle events (muteable)

* Play with animations to understand better the AI movements or just play fast with instant AI turns!

* 10 maps to complete!

This is an open-source project. Apart from @W01fw00d, many other developers have participated in its code. All the art was created by @gelabert.art with some modifications by @W01fw00d.

Code and assets are available for free on GitHub.
